duties_responsibilities.duty: Coach and lead guest-centric programs to exceed sales targets and improve guest satisfaction.
Provide leadership on duty and support Pet Care Center execution, training, and communication of company initiatives.
Process register transactions to create a great guest experience and be a role model within the selling model.
Support training, coaching, recognition, and development of directly reporting partners to run the Pet Care Center efficiently.
Promote a positive leadership culture of teamwork, inclusion, and collaboration by supporting priorities and providing clear direction.
Ensure ongoing replenishment and brand standards within the Pet Care Center.
Model inspiring leadership, promote safety, foster a collaborative culture, prioritize talent development, and engage with the team.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required; some college level business/management courses preferred. 1 or more years of management experience required, with 2 or more years preferred.
